exampleEn: The department is chronically understaffed.
Success is finally in our grasp.
exampleKo: 성공이 드디어 우리의 수중(손 닿을 거리)에 있습니다.

exampleEn: Refreshments are provided gratis to all attendees.
She declared her intent to run for mayor.
Please shred these confidential documents immediately.
exampleKo: 이 기밀 문서들을 즉시 파쇄해(갈기갈기 찢어) 주십시오.

exampleEn: The negotiations are at a delicate stage.
They devised a scheme to increase profits.
exampleKo: 그들은 수익을 늘리기 위한 계획을 고안했습니다.

exampleEn: The floor was scuffed by heavy boots.
exampleKo: 바닥이 무거운 부츠에 의해 마모되었습니다(흠집이 났습니다).

exampleEn: The immensity of the task was overwhelming.
Use the pedestrian underpass to cross the road.
The box contains miscellaneous office supplies.
We are in a state of perpetual change.
There are lingering doubts about the proposal.
The manager is tolerant of minor mistakes.
exampleKo: 그 매니저는 사소한 실수에 대해 관대합니다.

exampleEn: He was demoted due to poor performance.
Stock prices plunged after the announcement.
The complex layout of the building disoriented the visitors.
exampleKo: 건물의 복잡한 구조가 방문객들을 혼란스럽게 했습니다.

exampleEn: He was reinstated after the internal investigation.
Rumors can degrade a professional's reputation.
exampleKo: 소문은 전문가의 평판을 떨어뜨릴 수 있습니다.

exampleEn: You are cordially invited to the annual gala.
exampleKo: 연례 갈라 행사에 당신을 진심으로 초대합니다.

exampleEn: He often loses himself in his work.
The soldiers saluted the general.
The mood in the meeting was generally upbeat.
He acted in defiance of the company rules.
Birds forage for food in the winter.
We will deploy more resources to the project.
exampleKo: 우리는 프로젝트에 더 많은 자원을 배치할 것입니다.

exampleEn: We faced several hurdles during the merger process.
exampleKo: 우리는 합병 과정에서 몇 가지 장애물에 직면했습니다.

exampleEn: Foreign dignitaries visited the manufacturing plant.
exampleKo: 외국 고위 인사들이 제조 공장을 방문했습니다.

exampleEn: The area received designation as a protected site.
exampleKo: 그 지역은 보호 구역으로 지정을 받았습니다.

exampleEn: The incumbent mayor is running for re-election.
Building the bridge was an extraordinary feat of engineering.
exampleKo: 그 다리를 건설한 것은 공학의 놀랄만한 업적이었습니다.

exampleEn: The damage to the brand's reputation is irreversible.
exampleKo: 브랜드 평판에 대한 손상은 되돌릴 수 없습니다.
